title: Nonviolent Communication and Peace Education: Pre-Service Teacher Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Communication Skills and Understanding of Pedagogy
context.additional_context: A course for pre-service teachers to acquire nonviolent communication skills and peace education methods applicable in classrooms and daily life, emphasizing BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) activities and collaborative learning

learning_goals: Learners can integrate and explain diverse definitions of the concept of peace.
Learners can propose and implement peace practice plans applying nonviolent communication principles.
Learners can analyze cases of peace role models and connect them to educational settings
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
